doc.field: Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera

Includes materials from artists, including, among others, Adrian Paci, Wendy Paton, Ebony G. Patterson, Irving Penn, Raymond Pettibon, Sarah Plimpton, Richard Pousette-Dart, and Richard Prince. Also includes a foldout on a Sky Pape exhibition, "Water Works: Surface Tensions New Drawings." Includes a 2016 The Met sheet on "The Rooftop Garden Commission: Cornelia Parker Transitional Object (PsychoBarn)." Also includes a few Giuseppe Penone catalogues of the Marian Goodman Gallery and the Gagosian Gallery. Includes a Cade Tompkins Projects card for the exhibition, "Aaron Pexa: The Lucent Parlor" with a biography of the artist. Includes a brochure published by the Taipei American School Art Gallery to accompany the exhibition, "The Adventure of Endi Poskovic." Includes a MOMA catalogue from the 2007 exhibition of works by Martin Puryear.
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Series I. Single Artist Exhibitions >> P (Set 2) (2 folders)
